title: Samsungâ€™s next big event will be at Mobile World Congress
content:
Samsung’s last major product announcement event was just one week ago, on February 9, but the company is seemingly gearing up for another event. Samsung announced on Wednesday that it will have another event later this month, at this year’s Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona, Spain. The company said in a press release, “Samsung

The post Samsung’s next big event will be at Mobile World Congress appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung says it will have an event at Mobile World Congress later this month, possibly to announce new laptops.
